tool_description: Identifies and quantifies audience overlap between different social media platforms to understand cross-platform user behavior.

matching_criteria.description: Criteria for audience matching (email, username, user_id, behavioral)

error_messages: Insufficient audience data: At least 2 platform audiences required for overlap analysis
Invalid matching criteria: Criteria must be one of [email, username, user_id, behavioral]
Privacy restrictions: Audience matching is restricted due to privacy policies
Invalid overlap threshold: Threshold must be between 1 and 50
Insufficient overlap: No meaningful audience overlap found at specified threshold
usage: Provide platform_audiences array and specify matching_criteria for user identification. Adjust overlap_threshold to control sensitivity of overlap detection.

total_overlap_groups.description: Number of distinct audience overlap groups found

unique_audience_sizes.description: Unique audience sizes for each platform after overlap removal

cross_platform_users.description: Total number of users active across multiple platforms
